descr: "A structured set of tests against a FHIR server implementation to determine compliance against the FHIR specification."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a TestScript resource"

fields.name: url
fields.descr: "An absolute URI that is used to identify this test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this test script is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the test script. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions)."

fields.name: _url
fields.descr: "Extensions for url"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A formal identifier that is used to identify this test script when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance."

fields.name: version
fields.descr: "The identifier that is used to identify this version of the test script when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the test script author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence."

fields.name: _version
fields.descr: "Extensions for version"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A natural language name identifying the test script. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the test script."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of this test script. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: experimental
fields.descr: "A boolean value to indicate that this test script is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage."

fields.name: _experimental
fields.descr: "Extensions for experimental"

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date  (and optionally time) when the test script was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the test script changes."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: publisher
fields.descr: "The name of the individual or organization that published the test script."

fields.name: _publisher
fields.descr: "Extensions for publisher"

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A free text natural language description of the test script from a consumer's perspective."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: useContext
fields.descr: "The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate test script instances."

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.descr: "A legal or geographic region in which the test script is intended to be used."

fields.name: purpose
fields.descr: "Explaination of why this test script is needed and why it has been designed as it has."

fields.name: _purpose
fields.descr: "Extensions for purpose"

fields.name: copyright
fields.descr: "A copyright statement relating to the test script and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the test script."

fields.name: _copyright
fields.descr: "Extensions for copyright"

fields.name: origin
fields.descr: "An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the origin element."

fields.name: destination
fields.descr: "An abstract server used in operations within this test script in the destination element."

fields.name: metadata
fields.descr: "The required capability must exist and are assumed to function correctly on the FHIR server being tested."

fields.name: fixture
fields.descr: "Fixture in the test script - by reference (uri). All fixtures are required for the test script to execute."

fields.name: profile
fields.descr: "Reference to the profile to be used for validation."

fields.name: variable
fields.descr: "Variable is set based either on element value in response body or on header field value in the response headers."

fields.name: rule
fields.descr: "Assert rule to be used in one or more asserts within the test script."

fields.name: ruleset
fields.descr: "Contains one or more rules.  Offers a way to group rules so assertions could reference the group of rules and have them all applied."

fields.name: setup
fields.descr: "A series of required setup operations before tests are executed."

fields.name: test
fields.descr: "A test in this script."

fields.name: teardown
fields.descr: "A series of operations required to clean up after the all the tests are executed (successfully or otherwise)."
